FOUND IN: Taj Mahal - The most famous and iconic attraction in Agra, the Taj Mahal is a stunning white marble mausoleum built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan as a tribute to his beloved wife, Mumtaz Mahal.
"The Forsyte Saga" (1922) - This is the concluding novel in the series and brings together all the characters from the previous books in a final dramatic confrontation.
